mapper.select: SELECT CL_LotNo, CL_OrderNo, CL_ItemCode, CL_CrateCode, CL_Qty, CL_Create_Date, CL_Use_Status FROM Crate_Lot_tbl where CL_OrderNo = #{OrderNo} and CL_Use_Status = 1
SELECT concat('C', DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%y%m%d'), #{CL_ItemCode}, lpad(count(*)+1, 4, 0)) FROM Crate_Lot_tbl where CL_Create_Date > current_date();
SELECT CL_LotNo, CL_OrderNo, CL_ItemCode, CL_CrateCode, CL_Qty, CL_Create_Date, CL_Use_Status FROM Crate_Lot_tbl where CL_OrderNo = #{OrderNo} and CL_Use_Status = 0 order by CL_Create_Date desc
mapper.insert: insert into Crate_Lot_tbl( CL_LotNo, CL_OrderNo, CL_ItemCode, CL_CrateCode, CL_Qty, CL_Create_Date, CL_Use_Status )values( #{CL_LotNo}, #{CL_OrderNo}, #{CL_ItemCode}, #{CL_CrateCode}, 0, now(), 1 )
mapper.update: update Crate_Lot_tbl set CL_Use_Status = false where CL_LotNo = #{CL_Before_LotNo}
